attributes.action: David Cameron fullfill his promise of an apology to parliament
attributes.additional_details: "If it turns out I have been lied to" by Mr Coulson I would apologise to the house and "With hindsight" I would not have hired Andy Coulson are quotes of David Cameron.I call on the Prime Minister to deliver his promise with a full apology on his judgement on not vetting and hiring of Andy Coulson as his Press Secretary
